name: Omit Code Quotes
synccode: <div><div><div><div><div><div>raw {⟪</div><div>def rmCodeQuotesState0 (self, textList):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if (0 == len (textList)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return []</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; first = textList [0];</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; rest = textList [1:]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; if (first == '```'):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return self.rmCodeQuotesState1 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return [first] + self.rmCodeQuotesState0 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</div><div>def rmCodeQuotesState1 (self, textList):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if (0 == len (textList)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return []</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; first = textList [0];</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; rest = textList [1:]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; if (first == '```'):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return self.rmCodeQuotesState0 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return self.rmCodeQuotesState1 (rest)</div><div>⟫}</div><div>on ➢❲text❳ {⟪</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; text = message.data.split ('%5Cn')</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; result = self.rmCodeQuotesState0 (text)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; self.send ('[text]', result)</div><div>⟫}</div></div></div></div></div></div><div><br></div>

name: MD File Reader2
synccode: <div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div>on ➢❲filename❳ {⟪</div><div>if (re.search (r'%5C.md$', message.data)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; f = open (message.data, 'r')</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; result = f.read ()</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; self.send ('text', result)</div><div>else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; self.send ('text', '')</div><div>⟫}</div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div><br></div>

name: Omit Code Quotes2
synccode: <div><div><div><div><div><div>raw {⟪</div><div>def rmCodeQuotesState0 (self, textList):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if (0 == len (textList)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return []</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; first = textList [0];</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; rest = textList [1:]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; if (first == '```'):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return self.rmCodeQuotesState1 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return [first] + self.rmCodeQuotesState0 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</div><div>def rmCodeQuotesState1 (self, textList):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if (0 == len (textList)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return []</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; first = textList [0];</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; rest = textList [1:]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; if (first == '```'):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return self.rmCodeQuotesState0 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return self.rmCodeQuotesState1 (rest)</div><div>⟫}</div><div>on ➢❲text❳ {⟪</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; text = message.data.split ('%5Cn')</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; result = self.rmCodeQuotesState0 (text)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; self.send ('[text]', result)</div><div>⟫}</div></div></div></div></div></div><div><br></div>

name: MD File Reader
synccode: <div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div>on ➢❲filename❳ {⟪</div><div>if (re.search (r'%5C.md$', message.data)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; f = open (message.data, 'r')</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; result = f.read ()</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; self.send ('text', result)</div><div>else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; self.send ('text', '')</div><div>⟫}</div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div><br></div>
